subject: Rowing
Head of the Charles Regatta
lead_paragraph: The five-time world champion Mahe Drysdale of New Zealand cruised to victory in the men’s singles on the first day of the 47th annual Head of the Charles Regatta in Cambridge, Mass.
snippet: The five-time world champion Mahe Drysdale of New Zealand cruised to victory in the men’s singles on the first day of the 47th annual Head of the Charles Regatta in Cambridge, Mass.
